Name: Caviar - Endless Stress Reliever
About the game: About The Game Caviar is an amazing stress reliever game. Caviar is a casual game you can play at work, at home, in office, at school. This indie game is created for kids, girls, boys and adults. Simple one tap control. Explore amateur underwater world, collect gems to unlock new character caviars. Main Features - immersive, intense experience - superb ambient sound - simple yet dazzling visuals - gorgeous underwater world - relaxing ambience - beautiful art & vizualization - great immersion into atmosphere - relaxing time killer and stress reliever Steam Trading Cards (Coming Soon)
